com.communote.server.core.follow

Interface FollowManagement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FollowManagementBase, FollowManagementImpl

    @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
public interface FollowManagement
    Service class providing follow functionality.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void followBlog(Long blogId)
      Adds the specified blog/topic to the followed items of the current user.
      void followDiscussion(Long discussionId)
      Adds the discussion with the specified ID to the followed items of the current user.
      void followDiscussionByNoteId(Long noteId)
      Adds the discussion of the specified note to the followed items of the current user.
      boolean followsBlog(Long blogId)
      Returns whether the current user follows the blog.
      boolean followsDiscussion(Long discussionId)
      Returns true if the current user follows the discussion, otherwise false.
      boolean followsTag(Long id)
      Returns true if the current user follows the tag, otherwise false.
      boolean followsUser(Long userId)
      Returns whether the current user follows the user.
      void followTag(Long tagId)
      Adds the specified tag to the followed items of the current user.
      void followUser(Long userId)
      Adds the specified user to the followed items of the current user.
      void tagRemoved(Long removedTagId, Long newTagId, List<Long> followers)
      Method to be called after a tag has been removed or merged with another tag.
      void unfollowBlog(Long blogId)
      Removes the specified blog/topic from the followed items of the current user.
      void unfollowDiscussion(Long discussionId)
      Removes the discussion with the specified ID from the followed items of the current user.

      Removes the discussion of the specified note from the followed items of the current user.

      Removes the specified tag from the followed items of the current user.
      void unfollowUser(Long userId)
      Removes the specified user from the followed items of the current user.

    • Method Detail

      • followBlog

        void followBlog(Long blogId)
         throws NotFoundException,
                BlogAccessException
        Adds the specified blog/topic to the followed items of the current user.
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the topic to follow
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the topic does not exist
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no read access to the topic

      • followDiscussion

        void followDiscussion(Long discussionId)
               throws BlogAccessException,
                      NotFoundException
        Adds the discussion with the specified ID to the followed items of the current user.
        Parameters:
        discussionId - the ID of the discussion to follow
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the discussion does not exist
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no read access to the topic of the discussion or the discussion

      • followDiscussionByNoteId

        void followDiscussionByNoteId(Long noteId)
                       throws NotFoundException,
                              BlogAccessException
        Adds the discussion of the specified note to the followed items of the current user.
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note whose discussion should be followed
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the discussion does not exist
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no read access to the topic of the discussion or the discussion

      • followsBlog

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
boolean followsBlog(Long blogId)
        Returns whether the current user follows the blog.
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the blog
        Returns:
        true if the blog exists and the current user follows that blog, false otherwise

      • followsDiscussion

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
boolean followsDiscussion(Long discussionId)
        Returns true if the current user follows the discussion, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        discussionId - the ID of the discussion
        Returns:
        true if the discussion exists and the current user follows the discussion, otherwise false

      • followsTag

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
boolean followsTag(Long id)
        Returns true if the current user follows the tag, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the tag.
        Returns:
        True if the current user follows the given tag.

      • followsUser

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
boolean followsUser(Long userId)
        Returns whether the current user follows the user.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user
        Returns:
        true if the user exists and the current user follows that user, otherwise false

      • followTag

        void followTag(Long tagId)
        throws NotFoundException
        Adds the specified tag to the followed items of the current user.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the ID of the tag to follow
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the tag does not exist

      • followUser

        void followUser(Long userId)
         throws NotFoundException
        Adds the specified user to the followed items of the current user.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user to follow
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the user does not exist

      • tagRemoved

        void tagRemoved(Long removedTagId,
                Long newTagId,
                List<Long> followers)
         throws AuthorizationException,
                TagNotFoundException
        Method to be called after a tag has been removed or merged with another tag. In case of a merge the provided followers of the old tag will be added as followers to the new tag.
        Parameters:
        removedTagId - the ID of the removed tag
        newTagId - the ID of the tag the old tag was merged into, can be null
        followers - the IDs of the users that followed the old tag
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the calling user is not the internal system user
        TagNotFoundException - in case newTagId is not null but there is no tag for that ID

      • unfollowBlog

        void unfollowBlog(Long blogId)
        Removes the specified blog/topic from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the topic to unfollow

      • unfollowDiscussion

        void unfollowDiscussion(Long discussionId)
        Removes the discussion with the specified ID from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        discussionId - the ID of the discussion to unfollow

      • unfollowDiscussionByNoteId

        void unfollowDiscussionByNoteId(Long noteId)
        Removes the discussion of the specified note from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note whose discussion should be unfollowed

      • unfollowTag

        void unfollowTag(Long tagId)
        Removes the specified tag from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen. When unfollowing a tag all tags with the same lower case writing will be unfollowed too.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the ID of the tag to unfollow

      • unfollowUser

        void unfollowUser(Long userId)
        Removes the specified user from the followed items of the current user. If the item is not followed nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user to follow
